citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A 3 year old male Teddy (#33) had caked up feces on its rear end. Caked up feces can contribute to the spread of
disease and can also block the anus potentially causing the dog not being able to defecate. All dogs must be groomed on
a regular basis to prevent feces from becoming caked or stuck in the fur. Correct by 12/11/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A 3 year old male Teddy (#33) had caked up feces on its rear end. Caked up feces can contribute to the spread of 
disease and can also block the anus potentially causing the dog not being able to defecate. All dogs must be groomed on 
a regular basis to prevent feces from becoming caked or stuck in the fur. Correct by 12/11/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
